title: WTF i hate this league client it ruined league i cant even play
body:
Okay the new client is fine besides being laggy(been in it since alpha), but now its public so far i cant go back to the original non laggy client, if i click the go back to old client from login screen game crashes, i am running LoL in Administrator mode no firewall.

I am fine with it i can play in the new client so i go into ranked flex i have 1 loss then we pick its all g, then as the game starts i get a bugsplat. 
Okay all g i can just rejoin nope every time i try to do this i get bug splats, so of course they remake after i relaunch client multiple times, and i get leaverbusterd! Riot should implement a system where bug splats would not count towards leaverbuster, and WTF i understand getting a loss in my history so flex goes to 2/10 games played. WAIT i get 3/10 games so two loss's

So morale of the story MAKE SURE SHIT WORKS BEFORE ITS RELEASED TO BETA, and at least make sure people can always say no to beta however i cant go to the normal client.

replies.body:
Update: Okay so it seems Beta client cant update probably the reason seems i can launch old league through the .exe in my LoL directory, but still would be nice to have my 2 loss's taken away and my leaverbuster queue aswell.
Update: Now it says two games played at least.... from relaunching client again, still would like that game taken away and to have leaverbuster removed, but its RITO and they dont take responsibility for these types of things, but it is a company and they have there own business to attend too
